article_title: How Big Data Is Changing Healthcare

article_metadata.author: Bernard Marr

og.description: If you want to find out how Big Data is helping to make the world a better place, there’s no better example than the uses being found for it in healthcare. The last decade has seen huge advances in the amount of data we routinely generate and collect in pretty much [...]
